briefTitle: Evaluating PN 400 (VIMOVO) in Reducing Gastric Ulcers Compared to Non-steroidal Antiinflammatory Drug (NSAID) Naproxen
officialTitle: 6-Month, Phase 3, Randomized, Double-blind, Parallel-group, Controlled, Multi-center Study Evaluate Gastric Ulcer Incidence Following Administration of PN400 or Naproxen in Subjects Who Are at Risk for Developing NSAID-associated Ulcers
summary: This study uses a randomized, double-blind, controlled design to demonstrate that PN400 (esomeprazole and naproxen) is more effective in reducing the occurrence of gastroduodenal ulcers, dyspepsia, and heartburn in subjects at risk for developing NSAID-associated gastric ulcers compared to naproxen alone.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Gastric Ulcer Confirmed by Endoscopy
